title: Akamai Reports Another DoS in Log4j2 (CVE-2021-45105): What You Need to Know
description: The series of vulnerabilities recently discovered in Log4j2 has shocked the internet. As part of our continuing research, on December 17, Hideki Okamoto from Akamai found and responsibly reported an additional denial-of-service (DoS) vulnerability, which was assigned as CVE-2021-45105.
author: Akamai Threat Research Team
